title: Add instant delivery products to catalog

requirements.summary: Display an 'Instant Delivery' badge on product cards for products with instant delivery enabled
acceptanceCriteria: ProductCard component shows a visible instant delivery badge when product.isInstant is true
Badge uses appropriate styling consistent with the earthy theme
Badge is positioned prominently on the product card without obscuring other information

file_operations.description: Add instant delivery badge UI to product cards. Display a badge with 'Instant Delivery' text when product.isInstant is true. Position the badge prominently (e.g., top-right corner or below product image) using absolute positioning or flex layout. Style the badge with earthy theme colors (use OKLCH color variables from the theme) with appropriate padding, rounded corners, and contrasting text. Ensure the badge does not obscure the product image, name, price, or add-to-cart button. The badge should be visually distinct but harmonize with the existing card design.
